title: Focused on farming, while the world burns
body:
So I decide to really farm hard against Mao. I had 40 when he had 9. I had 90 when he had 45. Meanwhile, my entire team runs around like morons dying, starting bad fights, losing firs turret blood etc.

So I get criticized when my farm is low, even though the trade off is me roaming, objectives and assists and kills for other lanes. But if I just straight out farm the shit out of lane and stick to my lane hard, my moron team throws.

replies.body: Play Nasus if you want to try that again.
Correct, this is a team game. Sorry you had to learn that the hard way.

I wasn't in the game, so I can't really comment on what you were doing, but it's important to strike a good balance between helping with map control and team fights while also farming and winning lane. I've made the mistake of sticking to my lane too much and not roaming when I really should have.
